description: Serve buttery brioche hot dog rolls filled with rock lobster, mayonnaise, celery and chives at your next gathering to wow a crowd.
name: Mini Lobster Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 celery stalks, leaves included, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lobster on a chopping board. Place a tea towel over the back of a large, sharp knife, then place blade along middle of lobster and press down to cut in half lengthways. Remove meat from shell and roughly cut into 1.5cm pieces.

Cut celery into 12 x 14.5cm long thin strips, reserving leaves. Reserve a few small leaves for serving, then roughly chop remaining. Place mayonnaise and lemon juice in a bowl and stir until smooth. Add chopped leaves and lobster. Season with pepper and stir to combine.

Preheat oven grill to medium-high heat. Combine butter and garlic and season with pepper. Split brioche rolls, keeping the bases intact. Brush inside of rolls with a little butter mixture. Place rolls, butter side up, on a large baking tray. Grill rolls for 1-2 minutes or until lightly toasted.
Arrange 2 celery sticks in each roll, then spoon over the lobster mixture. Sprinkle with chives and cayenne pepper. Serve scattered with reserved celery leaves.
